Class ec.identity.name.IdentityNameList 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.identity.name.IdentityNameList
public class IdentityNameList
extends Object
implements Cloneable, Serializable
A list of identity names, ordered by their full name (case insensitive alphabetic ordering).

IdentityNameLists are compute but they are mutable (like Hashtables or Vectors). A given IdentityNameList should not be held onto by guest AND crew. One or the other is fine, but not both. IdentityNameList supports cloning so it is easy for guest code to copy a list and then give the copy to crew code (via a steward), or vice versa.

See Also:
IdentityName

findMatch 
 public int findMatch(String toFind,
                      int matchType)
Find an IdentityName whose full name matches the given string (case insensitive match). The match is either an exact match or a match of just the first part of the name.

Parameters:
toFind - - the string to match
matchType - - must be one of EXACT_MATCH or STARTS_WITH_MATCH. If it is EXACT_MATCH 'findMatch' will find the entry whose full name is exactly the same as 'toFind' (after lower casing). If it is STARTS_WITH_MATCH 'findMatch' finds the first entry that starts with 'toFind' (after lower casing).
Returns:
int - the index of the matching name, or -1 if no match is found.
Throws: IllegalArgumentException
- if 'matchType' is not one of the MATCH constants.
Throws: NullPointerException
- if 'toFind' is null
